basic_information.scholarship_name: Outstanding 2nd Year Graduate Student Award in Political Science

description: This scholarship is awarded to a Political Science major who exemplifies high academic achievement in their specific area of study and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student majoring in Political Science Completion of 18 graduate hours or more Strong academic performance (GPA)

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
